mapper.sql: id, car_imei, longitude, latitude, speed, direction, positioning_type, mobile_cc, mobile_nc, location_ac, cell_id, update_date, param1, param2, param3
mapper.insert: insert into detect_car_location (car_imei, longitude, latitude, speed, direction, positioning_type, mobile_cc, mobile_nc, location_ac, cell_id, update_date, param1, param2, param3 ) values (#{carImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positioningType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationAc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update detect_car_location
car_imei = #{carImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speed = #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positioning_type = #{positioningType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_cc = #{mobileCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_nc = #{mobileNc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_ac = #{locationAc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cell_id = #{cellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
param1 = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param2 = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param3 = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update detect_car_location set car_imei = #{carImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positioning_type = #{positioningType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_cc = #{mobileCc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_nc = #{mobileNc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_ac = #{locationAc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cell_id = #{cellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, param1 = #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param2 = #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param3 = #{param3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT car.car_imei,car.longitude,car.latitude, car.speed,car.id,car.update_date,point.point_name as pointName, point.license_plate as licensePlate FROM detect_car_location car inner JOIN base_point point on car.car_imei=point.IMEI where car.car_imei =(SELECT IMEI from base_point WHERE id=#{id} ) ORDER BY car.update_date desc LIMIT 0,1
